summary: App build focused on admin functionality fixes (login link, approvals, edit permissions, uploads) and ensuring responsive UI with no overlaps across devices.
known_issues: Previous build attempt failed: AI unable to implement request; may require simplified flow/prompting to proceed.

existing_features.title: Make the selected-admin invite link login/redemption flow fully functional end-to-end: admins can open an invite URL containing a token, log in with Internet Identity, redeem the token, and then successfully access admin routes.

Implement working approval actions so that all approval/decision buttons in the admin approval areas are enabled and perform real approve/reject operations against the backend for every approval type shown in the UI.

Enable full edit capabilities for admins across admin-managed entities already present in the UI (not just create/delete), including adding backend update methods where missing and adding corresponding edit UI flows.
Ensure uploads can be performed by all admins in all admin upload rooms, including aligning backend authorization so admins are permitted to upload where currently restricted to regular users only.
Fix responsive layout issues across all pages so no text or images overlap or render off-screen on common breakpoints (mobile, tablet, desktop), including admin pages with wide tab lists/tables.
Apply a coherent visual theme consistently across the app UI (colors, typography, surfaces) that improves readability on dark backgrounds while keeping the current information architecture unchanged.

new_feature_requests.summary: Activate and verify selected-admin login link works properly
Ensure admin approval buttons are enabled ('hot') and functioning correctly
Enable full edit capabilities for admins
Allow uploads to be made by all admins
